snippet.name: setget
snippet.starttext: <cffunction name="set$${uCaseProp}" access="public" returntype="void" output="false"> <cfargument name="$${lCaseProp}" type="string" required="true" /> <cfset variables.instance.$${lCaseProp} = arguments.$${lCaseProp} /> </cffunction> <cffunction name="get$${uCaseProp}" access="public" returntype="string" output="false"> <cfreturn variables.instance.$${lCaseProp} /> </cffunction>
